title: Pes ec cse vs dsce kumarswamy layoit cse.?Mainly for cse in cyber security
content: Which prepares us more to industry specific requirements??? Also include placements and any notable faculty achievements :-P

comments.body: Thanks bruh, but it would have been of more appreciation if you elaborated a bit, but still i thank yiu for a straight forward answer
You can look at the FAQs they're pretty detailed

More exposure and diversity inthe environment as jee ppl from different states Enter here....for masters abroad..pes has international recognition expecially in the US like carneige mellon, nyu, upenn, etc....and for placements requirements all....we are trained with necessary skills and the topics and subjects are thoroughly updated every year/sem and the quality of graduates and alumni is something beyond ur and my expectations.....so dsca is no where near in this comparison....atb
Did bro just compare PES to DSCE?
